body:
Yeah....
To explain why I'm leaving...
I kinda lost hope in this server,I'm offended by a lot of people on this server,I'm am sick and tired of getting this cold-shoulder treatment and I have reached the limit of how much I can take,everytime I win a match or something,I get cursed on.

Player 1:F--- you b----!!!
Player 2:Yeah get lost you noob.

I also find it really really boring nowadays,the max players I see everytime is like lesser than 200.
I might still come back on provided I get treated better,or if I see some improvement in the player count.

I will still be on the forums but very rarely.

See you guys around....

title: Leaving.

replies.body:
Tek, Don't do this! Please.
You are a very skilled, amazing, and funny guy.
Seeing/Talking to you lightens up my day.
Please, don't go. ;( <3

but when playing an online game these are the risks you're taking. As for the player count, I think it's your time zone ;(

replies.body: Im sorry your leaving, but if you get offended by kids saying stuff like that, the internet isn't the place for you and you have made the right choice leaving.

replies.body:
Farewell Tek. I feel sorry that you have been offended by many players. I hope they learn their lesson soon.
Goodbye. :'( .

Farewell Tek. I feel sorry that you have been offended by many players. I hope they learn their lesson soon.

replies.body:
Thanks guys,I'm moved by the kindness you have all given me,but I have reached the limit of what I can take.I have been downing this for 5 months ever since I got my Emerald.
I will officially leave the server in 2 hours.
I will check the forums from time to time.
Perhaps I will return again,someday.....

replies.body: Bye Tek. I think my days here are also almost at an end . Way too much criticism from players. I won't name names though, but the Avicus community just isn't like the MCZone I started playing in.
replies.body_tagged: Bye Tek. I think my days here are also almost at an end . Way too much criticism from players. I won't name names though, but the Avicus community just isn't like the MCZone I started playing in.

replies.body: Bye. That's all I can really say, Please don't go! As other people have said, you are a really skilled and funny guy. I would love to be in just one game with you before you go, just one. I don't know weather I have EVER played with you before, maybe a couple of times xD. It's soo sad seeing people go, from this amazing server :(. Please come back sometimes because Avicus keeps changing! It will be a great surprise! Anyway, I would love to keep talking but I've got to go. I will miss you! Bye!

Anyway, I would love to keep talking but I've got to go. I will miss you! Bye!

replies.body: Anyone know why we are crashing so much today? as for these " I'm leaving" posts - why bother just go if your going. The status of the server and community is what it is and it is not going to change because <u>people don't change</u>. You should just build a small network of friends and play with them - that's what I do.. works great and then there is no need to project your "needs" and "wants" onto a community that really has no business "taking care" of your feelings. Nothing wrong with the community on Avicus at all... as for the server stability.. that's another story.
replies.body_tagged: Anyone know why we are crashing so much today? as for these " I'm leaving" posts - why bother just go if your going. The status of the server and community is what it is and it is not going to change because <u>people don't change</u>. You should just build a small network of friends and play with them - that's what I do.. works great and then there is no need to project your "needs" and "wants" onto a community that really has no business "taking care" of your feelings. Nothing wrong with the community on Avicus at all... as for the server stability.. that's another story.

replies.body: Sorry to hear that. When you win and people swear at you, don't be offended. Just type <3. And if someone calls you a hacker, suggest to them to use /report. Don't go...avicus is losing too many players. If all of these people who left after avicore have stayed, avicus would still have 400-500 players

Dont take the insults personnally...

Just simply dont care... ._.

But i kinda agree with you....
I managed a topic for 8 months, thinking imma never be able let it go,  but it got worse and worse, and it was a bit more of a pain in the butt everytime i had to add pictures, it was slowly but surely killing me :/


Until i stopped and asked for Koo to lock it .-.

replies.body:
I've found Avicus with 700-800 people >_< I actually hate it at that range because Neb's full and boring like that. 

I seriously like the 400-550 cause Neb's nice and Avicade's on too. :D 

Bye Tek!!! I can't really convince you to come back because you've made your mind, but I just want to say that's it has been really an awesome experience with you. :D Good bye, but remember to come visit us time to time!
